<title level="1" right="Rules">[Alchemical Elixirs](/Rules.aspx?ID=705)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 546 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Elixirs are alchemical liquids that are used by drinking them. They have the [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=59) trait. These potent concoctions grant the drinker some alchemical benefits. While all elixirs follow the same general rules, mutagens (described below) have additional rules that apply to their use.
</column>

</column>

</row>
